title: Institutions/Museum/Trust and under same ownership, shown as Existing playground in DP, shall not be subject to mechanical acquisition and shall be for the use of that Educational and Medical Institution/ Museum/Trust
clause_text: Institutions/Museum/Trust and under same ownership, shown as Existing playground in DP, shall not be subject to mechanical acquisition and shall be for the use of that Educational and Medical Institution/ Museum/Trust.
